bookingInfoDetail.noCancel1: Once your booking has been confirmed, you will be charged 50% of the booking amount
bookingInfoDetail.noCancel2: if you cancel your reservation before the date
bookingInfoDetail.noCancel3: After that time, the full amount of the reservation will not be refunded if you cancel or leave
bookingInfoDetail.yesCancel1: When your booking has been confirmed, you cannot cancel or change your reservation. You will have to pay the full amount of the reservation.

bookingForm.2minBook: It only takes 2 minutes to book a room
bookingForm.beetwen10_11: Phone numbers must be between 10 and 11 digits
bookingForm.notSymbol: Do not enter special letters and symbols
bookingForm.rulesName: The name of the guest must match the name on the identification document used for check-in.
bookingForm.placeEmail: We will send you a booking confirmation via this email address.
bookingForm.bookOther: I booked a room for others
bookingForm.placeRequirements: For example: Can I check-in earlier?
bookingForm.notPayment: You don't have to pay for this booking yet!
bookingForm.desFooter: When submitting this booking request, you confirm that you have read and agreed to the booking
bookingForm.noInstantBook: Your reservation has been sent to the landlord for confirmation. If the room is available, we will send payment information to your email.
bookingForm.instantBook: Please wait a moment, we will redirect you to the payment page
